scripts.fame-ipfs:origin:build: esbuild src/lambda/fls-ipfs/origin.ts --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module';const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);" --platform=node --format=esm --bundle --target=node16.14 --external:ipfs-http-client --outfile=../../deploy/.layers/fls-ipfs/origin/index.mjs && cd ../../deploy && yarn build:layer:fls-ipfs

scripts.nodets: node --import 'data:text/javascript,import { register } from "node:module"; import { pathToFileURL } from "node:url"; register("ts-node/esm", pathToFileURL("./"));'
